EmailTemplate.name: Meeting (1559562093.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting (1559562093.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Andrea:You may remember me as we figure skated together in Oakville, and we still share a common friend in Tone Newlove.I hope life has treated you so well Andrea. Congratulations on your recent appointment to CFO.I'm looking to meet to discuss what impact the Global trade war will have on Indirect procurement for Kinross Gold.In just five days, the US increased tariffs on $US200 billion worth of Chinese goods from 10 to 25 per cent.Last month Walmart CFO Brett Biggs told Reuters that higher tariffs will result in increased prices for consumers.Should your calendar permit, I’m looking forward to speaking with you on Friday June 21st, to present strategies around mitigating the impact of this global situation. If this timing doesn’t work, please provide an alternate.Best,Erica Erica Kocijancic | Director, Business Development 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7E-mail: EricaKocijancic@grandandtoy.com <[[https://info.grandandtoy.com/VeXC0001R30C300MflMjXt0]]> | Cell: 647 631 5196 TECHNOLOGY I JANITORIAL I COFFEE SERVICES I OFFICE SUPPLIES | INTERIORS & FURNITURE | PRINT & DOCUMENTS | FACILITY RESOURCES
